name: Stories from 10 People I Once Knew - part 2
description:
I once knew a guy who lives in a land of freedom.
When everyone else was busy catching trends and pleasing people they don't even like, this guy only listens to himself and he doesn't let anyone decides what is good and bad for him.
 
One day, we met over coffee. We talked about things and He was relaxed, excited yet warm; all of them at the same time. 

I still remember how his eyes lit up when he told me about his day. 
Some parts of the story didn't make sense, but I started to think how great it'd be to be just like him. He talks the talk, walks the walk and made things happen for him and himself only.

At the end of the conversation I asked him; "How did you do all that?"
He said, "I take my time to breath"

--
Hello, Readers! This is the second part of a series called “Stories from 10 People I Once Knew”. My writings in this series are responding to stories of 10 people that once have touched my heart and I’d like to share them to 100 other people.

Hopefully you can feel the stories together with me and you can re-share them to anyone else that might need warm words. 

Hugs,
YY
